name: Criminal
content: A lot of people ask me
A lot of people think that
Or what I talk about on a record
That I actually do in real life
Or that I believe in it
Or that I believe in it
Well  sh*t   if you believe that
That'll stab you in the head
Whether you're a fag or lez
You'd better let go of em
Youll never get hold of em
And I was just checkin the mail
How many records you expectin to sell
Please lord  this boy needs jesus
Oh  and please send me a brand new car
I watch tv  and comcast cable
Cuz every time I write a rhyme
These people think it's a crime
To tell em what's on my mind
But I don't gotta say a word
I just flip em the bird
Cuz every time I write a rhyme
These people think it's a crime
To tell em what's on my mind
But I don't gotta say a word
I just flip em the bird
Slim shady  I'm as crazy as em
Don't make me kill him too
And spray his brains all over the place
You shouldve kept that thang put away
Ill be right here waitin on you
Hurry the f**k up  thank you
So Ill be disguised in it
And if anybody identifies the guy in it
If I ever gave a f**k  Id shave my nuts
I ma be a f**kin rapist in a jason mask
